name: dickensian
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
written by or in the style of the 19th-century English writer Charles Dickens
(also dickensian) relating to or similar to something described in the books of Charles Dickens, especially living or working conditions that are below an acceptable standard: The bathrooms in this hotel are positively dickensian - no hot water and grime everywhere.
